title: Yo-Yo
description:
A round yo-yo with its string coming out. It appears in various colors and designs across platforms, occasionally with a ‚≠ê Star on its side.

WhatsApp's yo-yo design displays the company's logo.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's yo-yo emoji is a vibrant, playful object rendered with a polished, glossy finish that emphasizes its smooth, rounded form. The bright, contrasting colors of the two discs, often shown in a dynamic mid-spin, are brought to life by Apple's realistic lighting and subtle shadows, giving it a delightful sense of motion. This charming rendition on Apple devices perfectly captures the spirit of fun, nostalgia, and simple amusement in digital exchanges.
